Package org.jlab.mya

Class Metadata<T extends Event>

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.mya.Metadata<T>
public final class Metadata<T extends Event> extends Object
The metadata associated with an EPICS PV. The metadata is the "key" required to query for events since it reveals what host to query and what underlying ID to query.

  • Constructor Details

    • Metadata

      public Metadata(int id, String name, String host, int size, String ioc, boolean active, MyaDataType myaType, Class<T> javaType)
      Create a new Metadata.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique database ID assigned to the PV
      name - The PV name
      host - The host on which events are stored for this PV
      size - The size of an update (scalar = 1, vector > 1)
      ioc - The name of the IOC generating updates for this PV or null
      active - True if the PV is active, false otherwise
      myaType - The MYA data type
      javaType - The Java data type
